Input:

  • An input sentence

Returns:

  • A query

Example 

x = "Cristiano Ronaldo belongs to the team "
query = QueryGenerator(x)
query -> "Get entity: Cristiano Ronaldo"

Note: The query will depend on what the KnowledgeBaseAccessor
